Uses of Package
simulator.framework

  • Packages that use simulator.framework 
    Package Description
    simulator.elevatorcontrol
    Contains classes that manipulate the simulated environmental objects.
    simulator.elevatormodules
    Provides sensors for detecting car position, door position, and door reversal triggers, and actuators for turning on button lights moving the doors.
    simulator.framework
    Provides the core infrastructure for simulating the network and elevator.
    simulator.framework.faultmodels  
    simulator.framework.faults  
    simulator.payloads
    The message types that can be sent on the simulated network.
  • Classes in simulator.framework used by simulator.elevatorcontrol 
    Class and Description
    Controller
    The Controller object provides an abstract framework that you will use to build your distributed elevator controllers.
    Direction 
    Hallway
    Hallway constants correspond to the front and back doors on the elevator and elevator shaft/landings.
    RuntimeMonitor
    This class provides a basic framework for implementing runtime monitors.
    Side
    Constant values for door and door sensor replication.
    Speed
    Speed commands for the drive motor.
    TimeSensitive
    Allows simulator components to execute at specified time intervals.
  • Classes in simulator.framework used by simulator.elevatormodules 
    Class and Description
    Direction 
    Hallway
    Hallway constants correspond to the front and back doors on the elevator and elevator shaft/landings.
    Side
    Constant values for door and door sensor replication.
    Timer
    Timer for simulation objects.
    TimeSensitive
    Allows simulator components to execute at specified time intervals.
  • Classes in simulator.framework used by simulator.framework 
    Class and Description
    AbstractTimer
    Allows elevator modules to schedule themselves to execute at specified times in the future.
    Button 
    Button.State 
    Controller
    The Controller object provides an abstract framework that you will use to build your distributed elevator controllers.
    ControllerSet
    Collection of controllers indexed by name.
    Direction 
    DoorCommand
    Commands given to the DoorMotor object.
    FileTokenizer
    This is the class responsible for processing files.
    Hallway
    Hallway constants correspond to the front and back doors on the elevator and elevator shaft/landings.
    MessageContext 
    Parser 
    PassengerController.Passenger
    A passenger who can press buttons and travel in the elevator car.
    PassengerController.PassengerState 
    ReflectionFactory
    A facade that provides a simple interface for instantiating objects, finding methods, and invoking methods.
    RuntimeMonitor
    This class provides a basic framework for implementing runtime monitors.
    Side
    Constant values for door and door sensor replication.
    Speed
    Speed commands for the drive motor.
    SystemTimer
    This class implements timer functionality for the system queue.
    Timer
    Timer for simulation objects.
    TimeSensitive
    Allows simulator components to execute at specified time intervals.
